name: Baby Lava Bounce
description:
Baby lavas want to live fast and die young. With your help they'll do just that!

Bounce along a tropical landscape and crash into fuel to propel yourself faster and farther. What is fuel? Anything! Pineapples, palm trees, tourists, boats, cars, cows, asteroids... you get the picture

Highlights:
- easy one button controls
- skill based gameplay
- pineapple destruction
- destruction of non-pineapple objects
- pixel art
- leaderboards and achievements
